message.body: I just dreamt that I got in a fight with someone for talking shit on wywh, and you were the oly one on my side
of course I was on your side, there's no other side to be on!
Orbs know that! I miss you!
Hey. I've been trying to be a force of positivity lately. I glow so bright. The universe has no shame slapping you in the face. Dim, dim, dim.
It's in the air. the universe is unsympathetic, the ether is as fine as the matter. It's only our sentience that betrays us. I can still feel the warmth of your glow...
￼Dressed to glow. Miss you.
Listen to this: I just ran suddenly out of a bar crying because I felt that two girls were being aggressive to me about not knowing details about it.
Panicking non-stop. How's Scorpio treating you?
Knowing details about what? The bar?
No don't panic! You are lovely!
Whoops..a pot luck at my house..which I don't want to have because I've been freaking out non stop..
James wants to have it..and I was trying to compromise.
Why are people so aggressive? Are they?
You ran out of your own house? Oh no! Why are you freaking out nonstop?
No idea. It's nearing insanity.
Oh dear! It's the season. Where are u now?
I'm sorry..I was at a bar when girls got aggressive about not knowing about a potluck at my house on Sunday..
So I ran out of the bar crying. I'm in bed now. Hahah, I feel like such a freak.
Haha, so much happened! I'm I bed too...blankets and bowl
￼I miss u most of all
Oh my, oh my. I love you.
And I, you!
I wish I could spend my birthday with an orb
Let's jump through the wormhole tomorrow.
Will you be home for thanksgiving?
Yes, let's! I will be home for thanksgiving, can we see one another?
Please!
I can't wait!
Are you in town yet?
My plans have changed, I don't think I'm coming. I saw the post about punksgivung and it made me so sad
Oh, humans..can't you see I'm floating?
Will u be in lanc for Xmas?
Ah. Not really. I am driving from Pittsburgh to lanc, to Philly, to Lanc back to Pittsburgh in those 30 hours.
Yikes! One day we will be reunited and it will be glorious
